title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 104.1 - General information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 104.1 - General information

State Regulations
A bank or trust company, savings bank or savings and loan
association which seeks approval of a public accommodation office pursuant to

Banking Law, section 191 should submit an application for such approval to the
superintendent, accompanied by payment of the fee specified in section
1.2
of Supervisory Policy G 1 of
this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
104.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
